title: Bear Lake children’s portraits
content:
It’s children portrait time again where I spend a little extra time with your kids to get them comfortable and have their personality show. 
  I will edit 5 images per child, and you get to pick your favorite 3.  Sweet, don’t you think? 
 
I still have room for more appointments for those who are interested.
source: Little Starling Photography- Utah's custom lifestyle photographer
